data.text: @digthisfood @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Thank you Pete that's a very kind thing to say

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Loved it.... you had me laughing from the minute we started filming and all through the edit... the only hard bit was deciding what to leave out- have a great Christmas Jay....
@PaulAinsw6rth @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @Cfulvio Thank you, Sir and you wasn't to bad yourself ;-)
@lorrainesophiad @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Me too :-)
@SusanKellyLord @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Thank you
@cathbaker14 @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Thank you :-)
@Cfulvio @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @BallyknockenHCS Look who's talking, Thank you and I will look you up when I'm in Ireland :-)
@dancersmum2012 @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Everything sounded a bit too out there for me but when I tasted them, WOWWWWWW the flavors was unreal

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Absolutely loved the look of the turbot dish, and also the poached pears, but will substitute the cinnamon in the cream for something else as I can’t stand the stuff lol!!
@CenyddR @Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio That made me chuckle.....tho technically correct!!!!
@_Kelly_Isaacs @Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio You can't be trusted in m&s either Kel.

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Me and the wife loved it. We had got fed up with cook shows but BCFE was great, good presents, good questions to the guest and different recipes. When was it filmed though? Always wondered.

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Started watching it before when this morning and it absolutely made my day. Didn’t get to see it all so going to watch it from the beginning later. Love watching you Jay 😃

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth You were brilliant Jay. 👏👏👏It was such a pleasure to cook for you. You’re a total inspiration. Look us up when you are over in Ireland @BallyknockenHCS  😘

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio At the risk of repeating myself, you were so fun to watch. Refreshingly honest and open and telling it like it is. The chefs reacted to that and the final product was a great tv show with some amazing food showcased - almost a bonus!
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio It's a tricky lad it's not a button don't step on it we'll never see you again 😂 lad

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio I loved it, you were funny, welcoming of all the food, you learned some cooking tips, and now will have to cook more than scrambled eggs. Even I have picked up some Christmas food recipes

@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio The onion and cloves reminded me of my nan when she used to make bread sauce from scratch. As I can't be trusted in the kitchen, I will leave the sauce to Marks and Sparks!!🍴
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Loved the up-cycled onion 😂

@Jay_n_Co @PaulAinsw6rth @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @Cfulvio I thought all three of you were great;  loved how enthusiastic you were about all the dishes (almost territorial you might say!) - Merry Christmas!
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Loved it!
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @Cfulvio I thought you were wicked mate 👊🏽🙌🏾👍🏽
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio Food looked amazing and you were like a little kid in a sweet shop, excited to get his treats 😂🎄
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio I was great, amazed that you can eat 2 Christmas’s dinners.
@Jay_n_Co @BBCOne @MyMorrells @duluxuk @PaulAinsw6rth @Cfulvio It was wonderful
